full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN GYI BLA BEEdURYA'I 'OD KYI RGYAL PO LA BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN GYI BLA BEEtURYA'I 'OD KYI RGYAL PO LA BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIGS RUS KHUNGS BTZUN ZHING GSO RIG LA SBYANGS PA'I YON TAN DANG LDAN PA AEM CHE TSE BRTAN RDO RJES YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO'I RGYAN DU 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
